column1: Uchi////Third time going to Uchi. Got there at 7:15 PM and was seated with a group of 5 by 8:15 PM. Edamame and peppers are two appetizers that I always order when waiting for a table
column2: and they were good this time too. Went with the vegetarian tasting
column3: which never disappoints. Brussels sprouts are always delicious. The Uchi salad is probably the worst part of the tasting. Uchi can sometimes feel like not enough food
column4: and the food was coming out very slowly tonight
column5: so that was frustrating. Best vegetarian sushi I've ever had
column7: has always been at Uchi. Peanut butter dessert was on point too.
